posts.text: Great, now he's going to melt on a train.

Almost half the nation's perception of reality is a complete delusion and they are willing to irrevocably harm the present and future of our democracy to protect that delusion. It's fucking terrifying.

>the better option.

The other option being [The Ättestupa?](https://youtu.be/DwD7f5ZWhAk)

Maybe we should have a nationwide poll, everyone who voted has to respond:

Was the 2020 US Presidential Election fairly won by Joe Biden? Y/N

Everyone who voted for Biden will reply Y, a few who voted for Trump will agree, and the matter is settled by popular opinion, with everyone's voice heard on the matter.

They can take a full week to count the results, and 70 million butthurt idiots can have a new count to be sad about.
